mapper.select: select mt.mentee_id, mt.mentor_id, mt.relation, mb.user_img from mentoring mt left join member mb on mt.mentor_id=mb.member_id where mentee_id=#{mentee_id}
select * from board where board_num = #{board_num} and board_writer = #{board_writer}
select board_num, board_writer, board_hit, board_title, board_date from board where board_own=#{board_own} and board_type="board" order by board_num desc;
select msg.receive_id, msg.member_id, msg.send_date, msg.content, mb.user_img from message msg left join member mb on msg.member_id=mb.member_id where receive_id = #{member_id}
